event_details_header: What time does the Olympics opening ceremony start?
event_details: The live NBC broadcast kicks off with a pre-show at noon ET Friday, and the ceremony itself begins at 7:30 p.m. Paris time, or 1:30 p.m. ET.

The Championships 2024 will be played over 14 days from Monday 1 - Sunday 14 July. The Championships begins with two days of Gentlemen's and Ladies' Singles matches before Gentlemen's and Ladies' Doubles start on Wednesday, and Mixed Doubles on Friday.

1951: Rochester 79, New York 75. The Knicks were part of the first two Game 7s in NBA Finals history -- and unable to win either. In '51, it was the Royals of Rochester, currently the Sacramento Kings, who prevailed for the franchise's first and only NBA title.

Stage 21 this year will be a time trial, the first time-trial finale since 1989. It will be a 33.7-kilometer ride from Monaco to Nice that will offer all kinds of terrain, which many of the riders have seen before when competing in the annual Paris-Nice race
